### 🎮 About Me

Hey, I’m Paweł (aka RaiderHCPlay).  
Web dev by day, anime and gaming enthusiast by night.  
I experiment with Svelte, Ruby, and Rust, and do all my coding in Neovim.  
I hope that Svelte will win one day... for my sanity.
